{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:46.500
    | text      = Travel bans always work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:47.700
    | text      = For instance, in 1987, Ronald Reagan put in place a ban on people with HIV or AIDS coming
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:52.500
    | text      = to America.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:53.460
    | text      = This did nothing to restrict the spread of the disease, the condition, etc.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:57.539
    | text      = The condition, excuse me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:58.980

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = costly, harmful and maybe discriminatory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:07.700
    | text      = The study found that travelers played little to no role in the spread, but efforts toward
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:12.019
    | text      = prevention made an actual difference.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:14.019

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:25.059

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:56.980

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:15.859
    | text      = So in October 2014, study of the actual travel bans put in place in response to the outbreak
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.859
    | text      = of Ebola found that, quote, the travel bans are only delaying the further international
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:26.819
    | text      = spread of the Ebola outbreak in West Africa for a limited time at the risk of compromise
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:31.380
    | text      = and connectivity to the region, mobilization of resources to the affected area and sustained
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:36.420
    | text      = response operations, all actions of critical value to the immediate local control of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:41.940
    | text      = Ebola and for preventing its further geographical spread.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:45.700
    | text      = So all you do is end up sacrificing the idea of people being mobile to some extent for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:51.380
    | text      = the sake of some imaginary lockdown you want to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:55.700
    | text      = So you wind up spending a shit ton of money for a lockdown that doesn't make any sense
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:00.180
    | text      = while not allocating any resources to the prevention and the treatment that would help
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:06.500
    | text      = a lot of people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:07.220
    | text      = That's a big part of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:08.099
    | text      = There you go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:08.500
    | text      = Shutting down travel to and from affected regions feels like the right thing to do,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:12.099
    | text      = but it's not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:13.059
    | text      = Not only does it not work historically, but it actually hurts things for two important
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:17.619
    | text      = interconnected reasons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:19.140
    | text      = The first is that it's not a reality that you're ever going to be able to shut down
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:23.380
    | text      = all travel across borders.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:25.140
    | text      = Borders are huge.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:26.180
    | text      = And people who really want to badly enough, they want to leave, they'll find a patch of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:30.420
    | text      = land they can slip across a border.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:31.940
    | text      = It's going to happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:33.140
    | text      = Like you're never going to be able to completely insulate something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:36.819
    | text      = This leads to the second problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:38.819
    | text      = If you shut down travel for people from an affected region, you create an incentive for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:43.299
    | text      = these people to lie about where they're traveling from, which in essence turns them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:47.059
    | text      = from a variable you could monitor into one that's now completely unaccounted for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:51.859
    | text      = Studies have been done that show that this is the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:54.500
    | text      = And for Alex to not know, this means that he's not operating from a position of wanting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:58.259
    | text      = what's best for the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:59.619
    | text      = He's just looking for any excuse you can find to let Africa burn.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:03.700
    | text      = The idea is when you do these these sorts of things, you like like I said there, you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:08.900
    | text      = incentivize lying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.579

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:15.220
    | text      = or whatever to escape.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:17.220

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = them.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:43.779
    | text      = But when you have an outbreak going on, it is in everyone's best interest to be like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:19.460

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
